short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically remove your X (Twitter) posts and likes from your account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of X or simply want to start fresh? Tweeter Deleeter is a simple extension that will automatically remove all your tweets, retweets, replies, quotes, media & likes. No need to go  searching through network requests to find tokens, it does it all automatically. 

The extension does not save nor send any of your information anywhere. The full code is on GitHub if you'd like to verify https://github.com/eelmafia/Tweeter-Deleeter-Extension
